channel.title: Look what I found on my daily trauls on the intarweb
channel.description:
Wasn't sure where to put this but what the heck.
Something that might be of interest, a roleplay community pasting the Black Mesa trailer and calling it their own:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8g7q9DL40Y8&feature=relmfu']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8g7q9DL40Y8&feature=relmfu[/url]
Thought it was worth a thread.

item.title: Look what I found on my daily trauls on the intarweb
item.dc:creator: Orpheon
item.description:
Dark Fraction is a roleplay community in Garry’s Mod, and the trailer is supposedly for their group. The owner of the YT account is apparently confused. He doesn’t seem to realize that the person who made the video used stolen footage, and thinks that other guy is saying the video belongs to another RP group. So he’s either dumb or he’s playing dumb.

Read full topic
item.source: Look what I found on my daily trauls on the intarweb

item.title: Look what I found on my daily trauls on the intarweb
item.dc:creator: elevenbravo
item.description:
I lol’d @

Are you saying you﻿ are the creator of something called Black Mesa? Grow up. You can’t be the only Black Mesa Roleplay Community.

Read full topic
